data.title: Word Filling

testCases.title: EXAMPLE
testCases.testIn:
__ this ___ hard to __________
3
too
is
understand
testCases.testOut: is this too hard to understand

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn:
__ this ___ hard to __________
3
too
no
understand
testCases.testOut: no this too hard to understand

testCases.title: Easy
testCases.testIn:
____ didn't _________ on this ______ it came from _____
4
space
life
originate
planet
testCases.testOut: life didn't originate on this planet it came from space

testCases.title: DUPLICATES
testCases.testIn:
__ i told ___ i was _____ what _____ i ___ to you?
5
you
if
smart
say
would
testCases.testOut: if i told you i was smart what would i say to you?

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
__ i told ___ i was _____ what _____ i ___ to you?
5
you
if
space
say
would
testCases.testOut: if i told you i was space what would i say to you?

testCases.title: MORE DUPLICATES

10
much

chuck

chuck

testCases.title: Validator 4

testCases.title: TOO MANY DUPLICATES
